Package eventHandling

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • eventHandling.EventHandler

  • public class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the EventHandler component of the simulation framework.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double currentSLACost
      Contains the SLA costs that occured during the point in simulation time at which the last call of the EventHandler happened.
      private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> finishedJobs
      List of currently finished jobs.
      private DC handledDC
      DC to which this EventHandler belongs.

      List of currently idle servers.

      List of currently paused jobs.
      private java.util.ArrayList<BatchJob> runningJobs
      List of currently running jobs.
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> serverJobMapping
      Mapping between running jobs and the servers on which they are executed.

        List of currently paused jobs.

      • serverJobMapping

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> serverJobMapping
        Mapping between running jobs and the servers on which they are executed. Where the keys are the ids of the servers and the values of the map are the ids of the job that is currently executed by the server that corresponds to a key.

      • currentSLACost

        private double currentSLACost
        Contains the SLA costs that occured during the point in simulation time at which the last call of the EventHandler happened.

      • handledDC

        private DC handledDC
        DC to which this EventHandler belongs.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(java.util.List<BatchJob> scheduledJobs,
                   int currentTime,
                   boolean updateRemainingTimes)
        Handle all events and elapse simulation time in all running and paused jobs.
        Parameters:
        scheduledJobs - List of all jobs that are currently scheduled.
        currentTime - Point in simulation time for which the events should be handled.
        updateRemainingTimes - Indicates whether a simulation timestep should be elapsed for the running and paused jobs.

      • getIdleServers

        private java.util.ArrayList<Server> getIdleServers​(java.util.List<Server> servers)
        Determines all currently idle servers.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of all servers in the DC to which this EventHandler belongs.
        Returns:
        List of all servers that are currently in the IDLE status.

      • getOccupiedServers

        private java.util.ArrayList<Server> getOccupiedServers​(java.util.List<Server> servers)
        Determines all currently occupied servers.
        Parameters:
        servers - List of all servers in the DC to which this EventHandler belongs.
        Returns:
        List of all servers that are currently in the OCCUPIED status.
